name: MortgageSpeech
0:
”Alexa, Open Mortgage Speech”
”Alexa, Ask Mortgage Speech to check my loans”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mortgage speech
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is a skill for Loan Mortgage Companies. The purpose of this skill is to enable speech to your dynamic data and serve as a marketing tool. The skill educates Loan Officers on using Alexa to help them in their loan process. It is a reference skill for Loan Officers.

MortgageSpeech develops skills for Loan Mortgage Companies and Banks that can be used by their 

-Borrowers
-Loan Officers
-Realtors
-Other Contacts
-General Public

The skill provides advanced features such as -

Borrower Proactive Loan Status Notifications
Loan Officer Proactive Internal Notifications of upcoming due dates
Optional Four Digit PIN before sensitive information is said out aloud
Play your marketing video on Devices with a screen
Inform your users of loan rates, your services and your contact details

In short the skill serves as the voice interface to your dynamic web - your own talking website.
The skill is a reference skill for Loan Mortgage Officers.
